title: Deloitte’s AI blunder shows the danger of faking work
description: Before using artificial intelligence, professionals should question how important it is to get correct results – and whether the work needs doing at all.
content:
Reporting on the uptake of artificial intelligence in professional and public policy contexts has forced me to grapple with how we decide when AI is actually useful and making us more productive, or when it is holding us back.

title: Changing Patent Research Tool
description: Artificial intelligence firm Perplexity AI Inc. is rewriting the playbook for intellectual property research. On Thursday, the company unveiled Perplexity Patents, a conversational AI agent designed to eliminate the headache of traditional patent searches — a process long plagued by complex syntax, high costs, and limited results. The launch marks Perplexity’s latest push into professional-grade Perplexity AI Patent Research Tool launches to revolutionize patent searches using conversational AI.

title: China must not be allowed to win the AI arms race
description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang is wrong. It matters greatly whether the U.S. or China wins the artificial intelligence race.

title: AI giants turn to massive debt to finance tech race
description: Meta raised $30 billion in debt on Thursday, as tech giants flush with cash turn to borrowing to finance the expensive race to lead in artificial intelligence. The trend toward debt is new for internet giants long accustomed to having ample cash flow to pay for what they want.
content:

description: How much companies will ultimately get back in return from AI products like chatbots is unclear
content:
